verses.verse: It happened, <WH120> when men began <WH2490> to multiply <WH7231> on <WH5921> the surface <WH6440> of the ground, <WH127> and daughters <WH1323> were born to them, <WH3205>
that God <WH1121>'s sons saw <WH7200> that men <WH120>'s daughters <WH1323> were beautiful, <WH2896> and they <WH2007> took <WH3947> for themselves wives <WH802> of all that they chose. <WH977>

Yahweh <WH3068> said, <WH559> "My Spirit <WH7307> will not strive <WH1777> with man <WH120> forever, <WH5769> because he also <WH1571> is flesh; <WH1320> yet will his days <WH3117> be one hundred <WH3967> twenty <WH6242> years. <WH8141>"

The Nephilim <WH5303> were in the earth <WH776> in those days, <WH3117> and also after <WH310> that, <WH3651> when <WH834> God <WH430>'s sons <WH1121> came in <WH935> to men <WH120>'s daughters. <WH1323> They bore <WH3205> children to them. <WH1992> Those were the mighty men <WH1368> who were of old, <WH5769> men <WH582> of renown. <WH8034>

Yahweh <WH3068> saw <WH7200> that the wickedness <WH7451> of man <WH120> was great <WH7227> in the earth, <WH776> and that every imagination <WH3336> of the thoughts <WH4284> of his heart <WH3820> was only <WH7535> evil <WH7451> continually. <WH3117>
Yahweh <WH3068> was sorry <WH5162> that he had made <WH6213> man <WH120> on the earth, <WH776> and it grieved <WH6087> him in <WH413> his heart. <WH3820>

Yahweh <WH3068> said, <WH559> "I will destroy <WH4229> man <WH120> whom I have created <WH1254> from the surface <WH6440> of the ground; <WH127> man, <WH120> along <WH5704> with animals, <WH929> creeping things, <WH7431> and birds <WH5775> of the sky; <WH8064> for I am sorry <WH5162> that I have made them. <WH6213>"
But Noah <WH5146> found <WH4672> favor <WH2580> in Yahweh <WH3068>'s eyes. <WH5869>

This is the history of the generations <WH8435> of Noah. <WH5146> Noah <WH5146> was a righteous <WH6662> man, <WH376> blameless <WH8549> among the people <WH1755> of his time. <WH5146> Noah walked <WH1980> with God. <WH430>
Noah <WH5146> became the father <WH3205> of three <WH7969> sons: <WH1121> Shem, <WH8035> Ham, <WH2526> and Japheth. <WH3315>
The earth <WH776> was corrupt <WH7843> before <WH6440> God, <WH430> and the earth <WH776> was filled <WH4390> with violence. <WH2555>
God <WH430> saw <WH7200> the earth, <WH776> and saw that it was corrupt, <WH7843> for all flesh <WH1320> had corrupted <WH7843> their way <WH1870> on the earth. <WH776>

God <WH430> said <WH559> to Noah, <WH5146> "The end <WH7093> of all flesh <WH1320> has come <WH935> before me, <WH6440> for the earth <WH776> is filled with <WH4390> violence <WH2555> through them. <WH6440> Behold, <WH7843> I will destroy them with <WH854> the earth. <WH776>
Make a ship of gopher wood. <WH6213> You shall make <WH753> rooms in the <WH8392> ship, <WH7969> and shall seal <WH3967> it inside and <WH7341> outside with pitch. <WH520>

This is how you shall make <WH6213> it. <WH753> The length of the ship <WH8392> will be three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> cubits, <WH520> its breadth <WH7341> fifty <WH2572> cubits, <WH520> and its height <WH6967> thirty <WH7970> cubits. <WH520>

You shall make <WH6213> a roof <WH6672> in the ship, <WH8392> and you shall finish <WH3615> it to a cubit <WH520> upward. <WH4605> You shall set <WH7760> the door <WH6607> of the ship <WH8392> in its side. <WH6654> You shall make <WH6213> it with lower, <WH8482> second, <WH8145> and third levels. <WH7992>

I, <WH2009> even I, <WH589> do bring <WH935> the flood <WH3999> of waters <WH4325> on this earth, <WH776> to destroy <WH7843> all flesh <WH1320> having the breath <WH7307> of life <WH2416> from under <WH8478> the sky. <WH8064> Everything <WH3605> that is in the earth <WH776> will die. <WH1478>

But I will establish <WH6965> my covenant <WH1285> with you. <WH935> You shall come into <WH413> the ship, <WH8392> you, <WH859> your sons, <WH1121> your wife, <WH802> and your sons <WH1121>' wives with you. <WH802>

Of every living thing <WH2416> of all flesh, <WH1320> you shall bring <WH935> two <WH8147> of every sort into the ship, <WH8392> to keep them alive <WH2421> with you. <WH2145> They shall be male and female. <WH5347>

Of the birds <WH5775> after their kind, <WH4327> of the livestock <WH929> after their kind, <WH4327> of every creeping thing <WH7431> of the ground <WH127> after its kind, <WH4327> two <WH8147> of every sort shall come <WH935> to you, <WH2421> to keep them alive.
Take <WH3947> with you of all food <WH3978> that is eaten, <WH398> and gather <WH622> it to yourself; <WH402> and it will be for food for you, and for them."
Thus Noah <WH5146> did. <WH6213> According to all that God <WH430> commanded <WH6680> him, <WH6213> so he did.
